title: Ezra Jack Keats
creator_credit: Cynthia Freitag, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: This film introduces the personality and style of Ezra Jack Keats, Caldecott Medallist, author and illustrator of well-known picture books. It concludes with an iconographic film rendition of one of his books “A Letter to Amy”.
creator_credit_for_label: Cynthia Freitag, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
